nodes.text: The Mark IV Locomotion System was a locomotion system produced by the company Everett. The R2 series astromech droid R2-D2 was equipped with an Everett Mark IV Locomotion System.

In the current Star Wars canon, the Mark IV Locomotion System was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the system was first mentioned in the 2006 reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary.
